description: Ensure form labels include readable text content.
recommendation: Add visible text or an accessible name to the label element. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.3.1,3.3.2)
algorithm: Flags <label> elements with no readable text and no aria-label/aria-labelledby/title alternatives.
algorithm_advanced: Matches <label> elements and reports when textContent is empty and aria-label/aria-labelledby/title are absent.
